intro: Trachelium tubulosum, commonly known as the tubular trachelium, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae and is characterized by its tubular, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from blue to purple. The plant typically grows as an upright perennial, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a slightly hairy texture. Trachelium tubulosum is valued in horticulture for its ornamental flowers and ability to thrive in well-drained soils.
